chatGptLabel: Create CTA Summary Paragraphs for Your Content!
promptPrefix: Create a summary paragraph of the following content that I will tell you about. Provide a call-to-action that is inspiring, hopeful, and based on the content I will tell you about. Do not repeat verbatim all of the main points from the content. Try to incorporate a sense of playful humor, but make the humor sound natural and connected to the content I will tell you about. Please make sure to respond in [TARGETLANGUAGE] The content for you to write a summary paragraph of is the following: [PROMPT]
title: Create CTA Summary Paragraphs for Your Content!
